text: Flora Lonette Davis Crittenden (August 10, 1924 â€“ November 2, 2021) was an American schoolteacher and Democratic politician. She was a member of the Virginia House of Delegates from 1993 until 2004. Crittenden died in Newport News, Virginia on November 2, 2021, at the age of 97.Former Newport News delegate, educator passes away at 97 ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American teachers Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Brooklyn Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from New York City
title: Flora D. Crittenden
